price: 68. Ni-Rabbow ken digaalá ni- digaalak namma dirribu (marduf) keenil-abaay, isi racmatak kaxxa mayxaarah ken eyxer.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍiʿ'fayni mina al-ʿadhābi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabīran
